summary: Over one million Earth's could fit inside the Sun! It is truly THAT big!
It takes about eight minutes for light to reach Earth from the Sun!
The Sun gives off solar flares that can affect our radio communications and technology!
A photon of light can take up to 100,000 years to get from the Sun's core to the surface!
The Sun has differential rotation, meaning it rotates faster at its equator than at its poles! Weird but cool!
